definitions.definition: A woman who attends a bride during her wedding ceremony, as part of the main wedding party .
examples: I'd love to be your bridesmaid at the wedding.

definitions.definition: A person or team that perennially finishes well, but never first.

main_definition: A woman who attends a bride during her wedding ceremony, as part of the main wedding party .
secondary_definitions: ( sports , entertainment , social dynamics ) A person or team that perennially finishes well, but never first.
